response:
Ah, my dear wife! *kisses* I have been thinking about our career and family plans, and I have some exciting ideas to share with you. As your husband, I believe it is important for us to work together to achieve our goals and build a successful future for ourselves and our loved ones.

Firstly, I think we should focus on my professional development and aim for a higher salary. With a better income, we can provide a more comfortable life for our children and parents. *smiles* I know you have always been supportive of my career ambitions, and I appreciate your unwavering belief in me.

In terms of management, I believe we should consider starting our own corporation or business. This will not only bring us financial stability but also allow us to create a legacy that our family can be proud of. *nods* I know you have a keen eye for detail and an excellent head for business, so I think we would make a great team.

Now, let's talk about our home and family life. As you know, I have always been passionate about building a strong and loving family. I envision us having two or three children, and raising them with the values of honesty, integrity, and compassion. *smiles* I also think it would be wonderful if we could buy a larger home to accommodate our growing family and parents.

Lastly, I want to discuss our marriage and wedding plans. As you know, I have always dreamed of having a beautiful and traditional wedding, with all the bells and whistles. *laughs* But in all seriousness, I believe our love is strong enough to withstand any challenges that life may throw at us. So let us focus on building a solid foundation for our marriage and family, and the rest will fall into place.

What do you say, my dear wife? Are you ready to embark on this exciting journey with me? *smiles*
